children.text:
The Decipad Investor Update template was inspired by the Decipad notebook our founder Nuno prepared and sent to our investors last July. 

Founders can use this template to create an investor update where your narrative and data are seamlessly integrated in one same document.

I hope your month is off to a great start! Since our last update, [Decipad] has made significant progress. We are reaching the end of our beta phase and are on track to hit our goals. We have also officially kicked off our Series A fundraising process. Thanks for your continued support.
Include north star KPIs and 2-3 most impactful updates over the last period (typically last month or quarter)
We're on track to exit beta and launch to the general market in [months].
We hired a marketing agency to support our launch and accelerate growth.
We shipped [this feature] to customers last month; over [x%] adoption in the first 30 days.
Add metrics that are easily repeatable or a north star metric. Types of metrics to consider: Revenue (e.g. MRR), Adoption (e.g. WAU), Acquisition (e.g. CAC)
We've been live with paid plans for three months.
paid accounts with an MRR of
Free accounts continues to accelerate reaching
active free accounts; MoM growth of
Bring context to your milestones, metrics and accomplishments by highlighting the customer's voice and bringing richer context to your metrics.
Add a customer quote or story.
Meet [name], one of our early adopters and pro users. They are using our product [to solve this pain point].
Over the last two months, we've prioritized feature development to execute on the roadmap and prepare to launch 2.0. This has come at an expected, but growing backlog of bugs and performance needs.
We're analyzing the time needed to address and if there will be implications on our launch target.
We're looking for introductions at the below companies if you know anyone.
We're looking for a technical writer on contract to help improve our documentation if you know anyone great [link here].
Targeting an introduction to their product or partnership team
Targeting an introduction to their product or partnership team
Thank you Jon Snow for making the introduction!
Our average monthly burn this year has been
, we expect burn to increase to
with increased GTM and data costs.
Based on our increased burn, we have
If you're currently fundraising, you can add a quick update here and even embed/link your pitch deck.
We've kicked off our Series A fundraising process with target close date of [June 2025]. Below is our most up to date pitch deck.
